thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Roku Qtrly Net Loss Per Share Attributable To Common Stockholders $0.07

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Roku Qtrly Net Loss Per Share Attributable To Common Stockholders $0.07
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Roku Inc:
* QTRLY TOTAL NET REVENUE UP 36% YOY TO $136.6 MILLION * ACTIVE ACCOUNTS UP 47% YOY TO 20.8 MILLION AT QUARTER END
* QTRLY NET LOSS PER SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS $0.07
* QTRLY AVERAGE REVENUE PER USER (ARPU) UP 50% YOY TO $15.07 (TRAILING 12-MONTH BASIS)
* SEES FY TOTAL NET REVENUE $685 MILLION TO $705 MILLION * SEES Q2 NET LOSS OF $19 MILLION TO NET LOSS OF $14 MILLION
* SEES FY NET LOSS OF $40 MILLION TO NET LOSS OF $25 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.15, REVENUE VIEW $127.6 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
